summary: The diff adds an execution log template for Rollout 21.7 and modifies backend/main.mo plus two metadata/summary files, but it does not show completion of the requested rollout build/upgrade steps, the post-upgrade smoke test execution for both roles, or recording smoke-test outcomes in the specified results file.

missing_requirements.requirement: Execute Rollout 21.7 build/upgrade deployment as described in `frontend/ROLLOUT_STEPS.md` Step 9.5, preserving canister state, and ensure the pipeline completes successfully (including no "Unable to create your app" error).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff only adds a partially filled execution log template and provides no evidence of actual command outputs, successful builds, successful canister upgrade, state preservation verification, or deployment pipeline completion.

missing_requirements.requirement: Execute the post-upgrade smoke test checklist in `frontend/SMOKE_TEST_21_7.md` end-to-end for both an admin user and a non-admin approved member user.
missing_requirements.reason: No smoke-test checklist execution evidence or results are shown in the diff; only a template execution log appears, and nothing indicates tests were run for either role.

missing_requirements.requirement: Record the Rollout 21.7 smoke test outcomes in `frontend/UPGRADE_LINKING_VERIFICATION_RESULTS.md` under “Rollout 21.7 Smoke Test Results” with required details (date, tester, env, principals, entity IDs, pass/fail, errors).
missing_requirements.reason: `frontend/UPGRADE_LINKING_VERIFICATION_RESULTS.md` is not modified in the diff, and no filled-in “Rollout 21.7 Smoke Test Results” section is provided anywhere.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a new Rollout 21.7 execution log document (`frontend/ROLL_OUT_21_7_EXECUTION_LOG.md`) instead of recording outcomes in the requested `frontend/UPGRADE_LINKING_VERIFICATION_RESULTS.md` file.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only requires recording smoke test outcomes in `frontend/UPGRADE_LINKING_VERIFICATION_RESULTS.md`; creating a separate execution log document is not requested.
